paper_abstract: This paper studies the problem of finding the path median on a tree in which vertex weights are uncertain and the uncertainty is characterized by given intervals. It is required to find a minmax regret solution, which minimizes the worst-case loss in the objective function. An O (n(2))-time algorithm is presented, improving the previous upper bound from O (n(4)). (C) 2015 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the minmax regret path median problem on trees
